basic_info.description:
I'm Hursit Tarcan. I'm a designer, developer and translator. I have been working as a freelance web developer since 2018. Iâ€™ve always been someone who has both a creative and a logical side. When I discovered web and software development in college, I realized that it would be the perfect fit for me. I could use my creative side to design, and my logical side to code.

 As an extra, I love working with languages. I'm certified in six different languages, I work on different open-source translation projects and I'm Translation Lead for Ethereum.org.

projects.title: Ethereum
projects.description: The most popular project I worked for. I'm a code contributor and translation lead. I wrote over 400 lines of code and translated over 60.000 words. I'm still working on this project.

projects.title: DOUA
projects.description: Custom website for one of my clients. Minimalistic website selling hair products.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
